hero.title: Discover Milfontes in Style
hero.subtitle: Tuk-Tuk Adventures along the Vicentine Coast
hero.description: Explore Vila Nova de Milfontes and surroundings in a unique tuk-tuk experience. Stunning landscapes, history and guaranteed fun!

benefits.title: Why Choose
benefits.subtitle: Comfort, fun and unique experiences guaranteed for the whole family

exclusiveRoutes.title: Exclusive Routes
exclusiveRoutes.description: Access to unique locations and panoramic views that you can only reach with our specialized tuk-tuks

familyComfort.title: Family Comfort
familyComfort.description: Safe and comfortable vehicles, ideal for families with children and people of all ages

quickReservation.title: Quick Reservation
quickReservation.description: Simple and fast WhatsApp booking system. Confirm your tour in just a few minutes

pricing.title: Transparent
pricing.subtitle: Fair and clear prices, no surprises. Guaranteed fun for the whole family!
pricing.basePriceDesc: Fixed price up to 2 people per tuk-tuk
pricing.additionalPeopleDesc: €3.50 for each additional person (maximum 4 people per tuk-tuk)

explore.title: Explore
explore.subtitle: Like Never Before
explore.description: Discover the best kept secrets of Vila Nova de Milfontes and Vicentine Coast from a unique perspective
explore.panoramicViewDesc: Enjoy the best views of the Alentejo coast
explore.historicHeritageDesc: Learn about the rich history of this fishing village

availability.title: Real-Time
availability.subtitle: Check available times and book your perfect moment
availability.reserveSpecificTime: To book a specific time, use the reservation form
availability.allSlotsBooked: All slots for {{period}} are already booked or blocked
availability.contactUs: Check other days or contact us

0.quote: Diogo Caria is a fantastic guide! It was a great experience, I loved discovering places I didn't know in Milfontes.
0.name: Ana Silva

1.quote: Amazing tour! The tuk-tuk is super comfortable and the views are breathtaking. I recommend 100%!
1.name: Luisa Almeida

2.quote: We guarantee a professional and fun service. Unforgettable tours!
2.name: Sónia Santos

3.quote: We discovered incredible places we would never find on our own. An unforgettable experience!
3.name: Unique Experience

4.quote: The tuk-tuks are modern and safe. The whole family had a great time during the tour!
4.name: Guaranteed Comfort

5.quote: Even at special events, the service is impeccable. Fun and joy at every moment!
5.name: Guaranteed Fun

faq.title: Frequently
faq.subtitle: We clarify your main doubts about our tuk-tuk tours
faq.q1: How many people fit in a tuk-tuk?
faq.a1: The tuk-tuk can carry 4 people plus the driver.
faq.q2: Do tours operate in the rain?
faq.a2: Our tuk-tuks have covers, but in case of heavy rain, we can reschedule at no cost.
faq.a3: We recommend booking at least 24 hours in advance, especially during high season.
faq.a4: Yes, we offer special discounts for groups. Contact us for more information.
faq.a5: Yes, all our tuk-tuks are equipped with seat belts and are perfectly safe for children.

cta.title: Ready for the
cta.description: Book your tuk-tuk tour now and discover Milfontes in a unique and unforgettable way!

footer.attributions: Images and icons from public sources and referenced authors.

reservation.title: Reservation request:
reservation.subtitle: Fill in the details and confirm via WhatsApp
reservation.name: Full Name
reservation.messagePlaceholder: Any additional information or special requests...
reservation.reservationDescription: You will be redirected to WhatsApp to confirm your reservation.

whatsappMessages.pending: Hello {{name}}, we have received your reservation request for the tour '{{tour_type}}' on {{reservation_date}} at {{reservation_time}}. To confirm, payment of €{{total_price}} is required. You can make a transfer to IBAN PT50 1234 5678 9012 3456 7890 1 or pay in cash on site. After payment, your reservation will be automatically confirmed.
whatsappMessages.confirmed: Hello {{name}}, your reservation for the tour '{{tour_type}}' is confirmed for {{reservation_date}} at {{reservation_time}}! Meet us in the center of Milfontes, next to the public garden. Any questions, we are at your disposal.
whatsappMessages.cancelled: Hello {{name}}, we regret to inform you that your reservation for the tour '{{tour_type}}' on {{reservation_date}} at {{reservation_time}} has been cancelled. If you need to reschedule or have any questions, please contact us.
whatsappMessages.completed: Hello {{name}}, thank you for taking the tour with us! We hope you had a fantastic experience in Milfontes. Recommend us to your friends and family. See you next time!
whatsappMessages.payment_reminder: Hello {{name}}, we remind you that your reservation for {{reservation_date}} at {{reservation_time}} is not yet confirmed. To secure your spot, please make the payment of €{{total_price}} as soon as possible.
whatsappMessages.weather_update: Hello {{name}}, due to weather conditions forecast for {{reservation_date}}, we may need to reschedule your tour. We will contact you closer to the date to confirm.
whatsappMessages.pickup_reminder: Hello {{name}}, we remind you that your tour is scheduled for tomorrow, {{reservation_date}}, at {{reservation_time}}. Meet us in the center of Milfontes, next to the public garden, 10 minutes before the scheduled time.

mapDescriptions.praiaDaFranquia: Close to the village and ideal for families, known for its calm waters and the Mira estuary landscape.
mapDescriptions.praiaDoFarol: Located near the lighthouse and the center, this beach is popular for its accessibility and views of the river mouth.
mapDescriptions.praiaDoMalhao: A wilder and more extensive beach, sought after by surfers and nature lovers for its waves and dunes.
mapDescriptions.praiaDasFurnas: Known for its rock formations and caves, it offers a unique setting for sunbathing and exploration.
mapDescriptions.praiaDoPatacho: A quieter and more secluded beach, perfect for those seeking peace and contact with nature.
mapDescriptions.praiaDoCarreiroDasFazendas: Characterized by its cliffs and more challenging access, it is a place of great natural beauty and serenity.
mapDescriptions.praiaDoPortoDasBarcas: A small cove with a traditional fishing port, ideal for observing local fishing life.
mapDescriptions.praiaDosAivados: A vast and wavy beach, very popular among surfers and bodyboarders for its rough sea.
mapDescriptions.forteDeSaoClemente: A historic fortification that protected the mouth of the Mira river, offering panoramic views over the coast.
mapDescriptions.farolDeMilfontes: An iconic landmark that guides sailors, providing a visual reference point for the village.
mapDescriptions.igrejaDeNossaSenhoraDaGraca: A religious temple with traditional local architecture, reflecting the region's cultural heritage.
mapDescriptions.estatuaDoArcanjo: A monument that stands out in the village landscape, adding an artistic and symbolic touch.
mapDescriptions.jardimPublico: A leisure and social area in the village center, ideal for walks and moments of relaxation.
mapDescriptions.parqueNatural: A vast protected area covering the region, preserving its biodiversity and wild coastal landscapes.
mapDescriptions.parqueInfantil: A playground dedicated to children, with equipment for play and fun.
mapDescriptions.jardimParagem: A small gardened area that provides a pleasant place to wait for public transport.
mapDescriptions.estuarioDoRioMira: A place of great natural beauty and ecological importance, perfect for birdwatching and riverside walks.
mapDescriptions.restauranteAChoupana: Seafront restaurant specializing in grilled dishes, always with fresh fish.
mapDescriptions.tascaDoCelso: A cozy and popular restaurant, famous for its homemade food and family atmosphere.
mapDescriptions.restauranteRitual: Restaurant and Tapas-Bar where the tranquility of the Alentejo coast merges with a refined and cosmopolitan atmosphere, full of stories and travels from around the world.
mapDescriptions.patioAlentejano: A restaurant with a pleasant patio, serving traditional Alentejo dishes in a relaxed environment.
mapDescriptions.restauranteHSBeach: A restaurant with a sea view, serving a variety of dishes including fresh seafood.
mapDescriptions.mercadoMilfontes: A traditional market where you can find fresh local products and handicrafts.
mapDescriptions.mercadoBrunheiras: Another local market offering a variety of fruits, vegetables and other regional products.
mapDescriptions.milsuper: A supermarket offering a wide range of products for daily needs.
mapDescriptions.meuSuper: A convenience supermarket, ideal for quick and essential shopping.
mapDescriptions.amanhecer: An establishment specializing in fresh fruits and vegetables, with a varied selection.
mapDescriptions.supermercadoSPAR: A supermarket offering a complete range of food and grocery products.
mapDescriptions.campifrias: Camping near the market and fish square.
mapDescriptions.jardimParagemDosAutocarros: Bus stop next to the garden.
mapDescriptions.frutasECompanhiaAmanhecer: Local grocery with fresh fruit, vegetables and daily essentials.
mapDescriptions.campingMilfontes: Campsite with great facilities, close to the center of Milfontes and nature.
mapDescriptions.restauranteOasis: Restaurant with sea view in Milfontes.
mapDescriptions.portinhoDoCanal: Traditional fishing port and leisure area.
mapDescriptions.ponteSobreORioMira: Bridge over the Mira River in Milfontes.
mapDescriptions.estaturaDoArcanjo: An artistic and ecological cry, made of recycled iron, that challenges us to think and act for the planet.
mapDescriptions.restauranteHSMilfontesBeach: Hotel and restaurant overlooking the mouth of the Mira river.

aerialViewMilfontes.title: Aerial View of Milfontes
aerialViewMilfontes.description: Aerial view on a winter afternoon over Vila Nova de Milfontes, Alentejo - Portugal.
